thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 12 of 750
thread.title: JASON
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by JASON

author: JASON
title: JASON
text: I feel a little deceived in that i was told that i could order either a Toyota Camry or a Holden Malibu. I actually really wanted to test drive the Malibu so thought this was a good opportunity to do so. The fine print says 'Malibu or similar' so i knew there was a chance i wouldnt get one. Of course when i got there the lady behind the counter gave me keys to a Toyota Camry. I asked her if she had any Malibus available and she said they dont even have any. I feel this is done deliberately, possibly to compete with other companies. But i couldnt help the feeling id been taken for a ride.
